amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to carry out the memorandum from the White House Counsel's Office to all Executive Department and Agency General Counsels entitled "Reminder Regarding Document Request" dated April 15, 2009 as it relates to the FOIA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the memorandum from the White House Counsel's Office to all Executive Department and Agency General Counsels entitled "Reminder Regarding Document Request" dated April 15, 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Gosar.
